PatternChecker module

class PatternChecker.PatternChecker[source]

Bases: object

Provides utility functions for checking patterns, extracting variables, and modifying assertions in strings related to smart contract verification.

static append_old_to_vars_and_return_updated(assertion, vars)[source]

Appends ‘_old’ suffix to specified variables in an assertion and returns the updated assertion.

Parameters:

  • assertion (str) – The assertion to process.

  • vars (list) – A list of variable names to be updated.

Returns:

The updated assertion with specified variables appended with ‘_old’.

Return type:

str

static follows_pattern(input_string)[source]

Checks if the input string follows a specific pattern for variable assignments.

Parameters:

input_string (str) – The string to check.

Returns:

True if the input string follows the pattern, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

static get_all_old_variables(input_string)[source]

Extracts all variables with ‘_old’ suffix from the input string.

Parameters:

input_string (str) – The string to search.

Returns:

A list of unique variable names with ‘_old’ suffix found in the input string.

Return type:

list

static pre_condition_not_having_old_vars(preC, postC)[source]

Validates that a pre-condition does not contain variables with ‘_old’ suffix.

Parameters:

  • preC (str) – The pre-condition to validate.

  • postC (str) – The post-condition, used for context.

Raises:

Exception – If ‘_old’ variables are found in the pre-condition.

static replace_var_with_old_in_pre(preC, postC_vars, var_names)[source]

Replaces variables in a pre-condition with their ‘_old’ counterparts.

Parameters:

  • preC (str) – The pre-condition to process.

  • postC_vars (list) – A list of variables from the post-condition.

  • var_names (dict) – A dictionary mapping variable names to their types.

Returns:

A tuple containing the updated pre-condition and a list of input variables.

Return type:

tuple

static z3_post_condition(postC, var_names)[source]

Processes and returns a Z3 compatible post-condition assertion.

Parameters:

  • postC (str) – The post-condition assertion to process.

  • var_names (dict) – A dictionary mapping variable names to their types.

Returns:

A tuple containing the processed post-condition assertion and a list of variable names.

Return type:

tuple[str, list[str]]
